alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Lowndes (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 12 at 4:17AM EST until further notice by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Withlacoochee River above Valdosta (Skipper Bridge Rd) affecting Lowndes and Brooks Counties. For the Withlacoochee River...including Valdosta (Skipper Bridge Rd)...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Withlacoochee River above Valdosta (Skipper Bridge Rd). * WHEN...From this afternoon until further notice. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 AM EST Sunday the stage was 132.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 137.4 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 135.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 137.3 feet on 03/04/1994. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 1030 PM EST.
